localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: This MVP version helps users to discover interesting events based on a smart tags system and user proximity. The Housely app provides event hosts with a solution for scheduling and organizing club events, in an easy-to-use way.
blogPost.body: This MVP version helps users to discover interesting events based on a smart tags system and user proximity. The Housely app provides event hosts with a solution for scheduling and organizing club events, in an easy-to-use way.
blogPost.title: Housely club - Clubhouse events schedule and browsing app
blogPost.author: Vladimir Yancharuk

localize.description: 这款MVP版本帮助用户基于智能标签系统和用户近距离发现有趣的活动。Housely应用为活动主办方提供了一个安排和组织俱乐部活动的解决方案，简单易用。
localize.tagline: 会所活动时间表和浏览应用程序

localize.description: 這款MVP版本幫助用戶基於智能標籤系統和用戶近距離發現有趣的活動。Housely應用爲活動主辦方提供了一個安排和組織俱樂部活動的解決方案，簡單易用。
localize.tagline: 會所活動時間表和瀏覽應用程序

previous.title: Mochi mobile - Take notes in markdown, study them with spaced repetition

localize.description: Mochi = 间隔重复 + Zettelkasten + Markdown。
localize.tagline: 用标记法做笔记，隔空重复学习。

localize.description: Mochi = 間隔重複 + Zettelkasten + Markdown。
localize.tagline: 用標記法做筆記，隔空重複學習。

next.excerpt: Easily create linear, radial, and conic gradients that avoid the dreaded "gray zone" in the middle of many gradients. Export as CSS or SVG.
next.title: Gradient Generator - Create perceptually smooth gradients of all types

localize.description: 轻松创建线性、径向和锥形渐变，避免了许多渐变中间可怕的 "灰色区域"。可导出为CSS或SVG。
localize.tagline: 创建各种类型的感性平滑渐变。

localize.description: 輕鬆創建線性、徑向和錐形漸變，避免了許多漸變中間可怕的 "灰色區域"。可導出爲CSS或SVG。
localize.tagline: 創建各種類型的感性平滑漸變。
